cause.description:
Education is an important aspect. This organisation will focus on providing education to the deprived and simultaneously focus on student retention till 12th grade and bonus packages which may include food, clothing and shelter or one of them to the mother of student studying in the school.
Education Institution will be opened in New delhi and other parts of India.
Kashmir will be its key focus.
1. Education is important.
2. Nations strength is education.
3. Poor (Deprived) Student will only pursue education if he enjoys it.
cause.mission: To provide state of art education to the deprived.
cause.name: SCHOOL FOR POOR (SFP)
